title: How to link a website to a blog - Quora

response.answer_text: Let me rephrase your question for the benefit of answering it. You have a websiteYou want to start a blog.You then eant this blog to the website.It is possible. Install blog cms like WordPress on your sub domain. like blog.yoursite.com. Install and setup WordPress to that sub domain. You can keep the theme separate from your main website ot work with styling customization to make the appearance in line with your website. Then link this blog with its url on your website.

As per your query it seems you want to create a blog link on your website, so there are two ways for the same one you can create a sub-domain and install wordpress there and then you can put a link with the name blog in your website. http://blog.yourdomainname Another way is if you do not want to host blog on sub-domain then you can create a folder with the name blog under your root folder and then you can create that folder as virtual directory which you can use as given below. http://yourdomainname/blog
